generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Impeachment inquiry: White House releases rough transcript of Trump's earlier call with Zelensky," you can expect to read about the ongoing developments in the impeachment inquiry involving former President Trump. The article is likely to provide an overview of the rough transcript released by the White House, detailing the contents of Trump's call with Ukrainian President Zelensky. It may also discuss the implications of this transcript for the impeachment proceedings, including reactions from political figures and analysts. Overall, the article should aim to clarify the context and significance of this release in relation to the inquiry.
